metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6061 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An exploitable heap out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the way CoTURN 4.5.1.1 web server parses POST requests. A specially crafted HTTP POST request can lead to information leaks and other misbehavior. An attacker needs to send an HTTPS request to trigger this vulnerability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6061` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

coturn - 4.5.0.7-1ubuntu2.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: coturn package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.5.0.7-1ubuntu2.18.04.2').
